label: 仏名会
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A religious event held for three days in the palace and in other aristocratic houses, starting on the nineteenth day of the twelfth month.  The ceremony involved invoking the names of the Buddhas of past, present, and future, in a spirit of repentance and atonement. [RK]
